snippet: The baker and candy aficionado Amirah Kassem used nearly 10,000 of the treats to recreate the artist’s famous smiling flowers.
lead_paragraph: The baker and candy aficionado Amirah Kassem used nearly 10,000 of the treats to recreate the artist’s famous smiling flowers.

headline.main: Flour Shop’s Installation for the Brooklyn Artists Ball Is a Gumball Homage to Murakami
